mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.yzbgs AS "yzbgs", a.djbgs AS "djbgs", a.ywk AS "ywk", a.hlk AS "hlk", a.cwk AS "cwk", a.daglk AS "daglk", a.xxzx AS "xxzx", a.ygk AS "ygk", a.ybjsk AS "ybjsk", a.hqglk AS "hqglk", a.tj_remarks AS "tj_remarks", a.dep_id AS "dep_id"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_department_znglb( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, yzbgs, djbgs, ywk, hlk, cwk, daglk, xxzx, ygk, ybjsk, hqglk, tj_remarks, dep_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{yzbgs}, #{djbgs}, #{ywk}, #{hlk}, #{cwk}, #{daglk}, #{xxzx}, #{ygk}, #{ybjsk}, #{hqglk}, #{tj_remarks}, #{dep_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_department_znglb SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, yzbgs = #{yzbgs}, djbgs = #{djbgs}, ywk = #{ywk}, hlk = #{hlk}, cwk = #{cwk}, daglk = #{daglk}, xxzx = #{xxzx}, ygk = #{ygk}, ybjsk = #{ybjsk}, hqglk = #{hqglk}, tj_remarks = #{tj_remarks}, dep_id = #{dep_id} WHERE id = #{id}
